_header: Mary had worlds weal and riches plenty
Note: For other MSS see 6795; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4189.
_description: Narratio, Mary Magdalene, according to one MS of the Northern Homily Cycle.

CULDd11.First Lines:
Marie had worldis wele & richesse plenteWhil sche was ȝong
                    & ful of beute…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Amen sey we alle in samefor þer is al endeles game
                    amen
